Name: Green Beetle
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tequila and lemon aromatized by absinthe.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Alex Richer at Bar Red in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Beetle contains 195 calories
